title: Expressing f(x) in terms of the roots, then expand it.
text: We can express f(x) as the multiplication of the four factors scaled by a constant a. In this case, we know that the factors are (x + 3), (x - 2), (x - i), (x + i). As such, we can rewrite f(x) $$=$$ a*(x + 3)*(x - 2)*(x - i)*(x + i).
